page.title: 10Rare Birds in Sarn 2
page.content: Mr Pritchard first became{interested} in birds when he was eleven years old. He spends 2 hours per week with his birds.The birds stay in their house, summer and winter.The houses are not heated in the winter because the birds are used to cold weather.His{favourite {bird}is called the Cockateal because it will live in an aviary with any other bird, and can be taught to talk. He loses about 5 birds in the winter months because of the cold weather. Sometimes some of his birds abandon their nest after being disturbed by mice, or fighting with other birds in the area.The only wild birds that frighten his are the hawks.The only loud noises that disturb his birds are low flying aircraft.The first birds he started breeding were racing pigeons. The highest price he has been paid for a bird is Â£100.
